after_item1: All your personal data will be permanently deleted
after_item2: The history of bookings and visits will be anonymized
after_item3: You can create a new account at any time
data_item2: History of visits and appointments for procedures
delete_text: Please delete all my personal data

intro: We respect your right to privacy and provide the opportunity to remove all of your personal data from our system.
processing_desc: We will process your request within 7 business days and send confirmation of data deletion.
title: Deleting data
